message: I find it always funny when zionists deny something even their masters agreed with """"Jewish villages were built in the place of Arab villages. You do not even know the names of these Arab villages, and I do not blame you because geography books no longer exist. Not only do the books not exist, the Arab villages are not there either. Nahlal arose in the place of Mahlul; Kibbutz Gvat in the place of Jibta; Kibbutz Sarid in the place of Huneifis; and Kefar Yehushua in the place of Tal al-Shuman. There is not a single place built in this country that did not have a former Arab population."""" -- Moshe Dayan, April 1969, Ha'aretz; quoted in Edward Said, 'Zionism from the Standpoint of Its Victims', Social Text, Volume 1, 1979, 7-58. """"Let us not ignore the truth among ourselves ... politically we are the aggressors and they defend themselves... The country is theirs, because they inhabit it, whereas we want to come here and settle down, and in their view we want to take away from them their country."""" -- David Ben Gurion, quoted on pp 91-2 of Chomsky's Fateful Triangle, which appears in Simha Flapan's """"Zionism and the Palestinians pp 141-2 citing a 1938 speech.
MORE OF A REASON TO VOTE Donald J. Trump

Right, everyone gets thirteen years of free school as it is, so of course four more years of free school is not outlandish. Lots of public universities in the USA have or have had free tuition, so it is again, not an outlandish idea. Lots of other developed and even some undeveloped countries have free secondary education, so it is not a radical idea at all. The only people that want you to think it is radical for USA citizens to have things that other developed countries have or even that USA citizens have had in the past are neo-conservative and/or fascist tools.

My brothers wedding was over the top luxury -- All the bells and whistles. He married into a wealthy family, but still the debt they personally incurred on credit cards was only paid off when they sold their home. Every penny of the initial home investment paid off the wedding, and now they are starting from scratch financially. It still stuns me. I'll never understand people who insist on lavish weddings.

As I said, show me where the white child is the minority, or better yet show me an ad with no whites. I'm just saying people, if you walked by an Ebony magazine and saw 3 black girls and a white girl in the same pose, you would feel a certain kind of way about it. Or maybe not because whites are not used to seeing themselves as the underdog. Listen when I was 13, my ballet teacher put me and only me in an ad, and within a year she went from having a major white school to an all black dancing school. Things haven't changed much in that industry and neither has it changed in the tv industry. Show me an ad with all blacks, would that be racist???

I'm a very opened minded person that's always willing to have a change of opinion. For the sake of this post, I'll say you convinced me that what you claim is true. Two questions; when you say the media, is that a general statement, as in not all media outlets are state controlled spreading an agenda, or that literally all of them do? Where would I cite proof to others that ask me since the burden of proof falls on you?
